Solving word problems can be very challenging yet exciting. To make this lesson easier and interesting, you must review the steps in solving word problem first. Here are some problems and try to find out how to answer this using the steps indicated. Are you ready?

Example:

Divide: 18 รท 1 1/8

= 18 รท 1 1/8 = dividing whole number by mixed fraction

= 18 รท 9/8 = to divide whole number by mixed fraction, change mixed fraction to improper fraction by multiplying the denominator by the whole number plus the numerator.

= 18/1 ร 8/9 = to divide whole number by fraction, get the reciprocal of the divisor then proceed to multiplication and whole number has a denominator of 1

= 18 x 8/1 x 9 = multiply numerator by numerator and denominator by denominator

= 9 x 2 x 8/1 x 9 = factor out the numerator and denominator if possible and apply cancellation method to simplify your answer.

= 2 x 8/1 = simplify your answer

= 16/1 = any number divided by 1 is equal to the number

= 16

Answer: There are 16 slices that can be cut from the loaf of bread 18 inches long.
